entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -32.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 10:54 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -32.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 72 %
Dewpoint: -36.0°C
Wind: N 1 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 51 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 34. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
